post.text: There are a lot of bullies in this world. The last thing we need is one in the White House.

comment.author: Eleazar
comment.text: Hillary president of America Hillary Woman of Courage Hillary heroine history Hillary set an example for the world I love the American people I am a Moroccan businessman who loved the Clinton family Is it possible to meet my mistress Hillary? O American people helped me

replies.author: Garrett
replies.text: Get up there my fellow Americans This November and vote for Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton for president they're going to make America the most awesome place ever again In another way you can grab the freedom and you can go to McDonald's and eat one of everything on the menu and you will feel free to vote for Hillary Tylerham Clinton and Donald Trump all at the same time it's groovy man Come on my fellow Americans go out there and grab America by the freedom and take it and use that freedom for good So go out there and vote and make sure that you have freedom and make sure that you use the freedom for good not evil so use your freedom to make America a wonderful place again You may ask yourself what is freedom? Freedom is being able to eat Top Ramen with extra stuff in it so it taste extra good right freedom is riding the bus to the voter's ballot in voting for Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton at the same time right and that's freedom Come on and grab some freedom and both in this November's election for Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton So of course you do I know you look for them so I want you to have some freedom and hit the road? So do you like freedom? Of course everyone loves freedom and the best way to get freedom is to hoping your freedom car and pushed the freedom Throttle Down it's the pedal on the right and push that freedom throttle and drive your freedom card and go buy some more Freedom by voting for Hillary Tylerham Clinton and Donald Trump you will get freedom in November When you know it's coming freedoms coming Freedom's coming in November you can vote for freedom Hey do you feel like? I feel it it's called freedom to vote for Hillary and Donald at the same time. Remember when freedom is in your heart everything will work out fine Ok folks keep your spirit up, because you have a choice this November you can vote for Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump because we do not need the money to buy a new phone. It's really interesting listening to your information thanks for sharing. You make a lot of wonderful points and I'm glad you shared them Thanks for sharing this with me it was really good to get this information. Thanks again. My brothers and sisters rejoice in the fact that whether Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump is elected president this country will still be the greatest country in the world. Just remember in your heart that if you pay your bills and are honest you'll be able to vote for Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton. I remember ever since I was born I've been told America is the greatest country ever and it definitely is. When you work hard and do your best freedom is readily available in this great country and don't forget to vote and vote often. Let Freedom Ring from The Mountaintop and know that Trump Donald J Trump is going to be a great president in 2016. Also vote for Hillary Tylerham Clinton for president 2016.

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: JUST HOW CROOKED CAN SHE GET? Hillary Clinton's aides offered the FBI bribes to change the classification of documents-- how much more crooked are the Clintons going to get...

replies.author: Steven
replies.text: There is no doubt that the USA is a more dangerous place and more racially divided than it has been in 40 years. Failed government Healthcare, slowest GDP growth rate in American history, an out of control debt. Black unemployment rate around 10%. Student loans are up, people that are on food stamps is up, money printing is up, health insurance cost is up. While median family income is down, new home ownership is down, worker's share economy is down. Wage increases haven't even come close to staying up with the cost of living increases. No more dynasties. No more Bushes no more Clinton's. We need term limits on all politicians Go to Washington serve your country then get out. You can't keep voting for the same corrupt career politicians and expect some great change, that doesn't make sense. Time to move into 21st century politics.

replies.author: Pkoe
replies.text: TIME FOR SOME OF YOU TO RETHINK YOUR SUPPORT OF #CROOKEDHillary!.. IF SHE AND BILL EVER GET BACK IN, THEY NEVER INTEND TO LEAVE! #NeverHILLARY
